display_name: PSG Results: Calculated - RDI with arousals (>= 0% desaturation)
description: missing if total sleep time is 0 or if studies scored as sleep/wake or where arousals were ignored
calculation: rdim0pa = 60*(hremba +hroa + hnrba + hnroa +carba + caroa + canba + canoa + oarba +oaroa + oanba + oanoa +  marbpa + maropa + manrbpa + manropa)/slpprdp
